name: Snow Fox Design System
description:
Looking for a design system that will help you create beautiful, consistent user interfaces across all your digital products? Look no further than Snow Fox!


Our Figma design system and component library is the perfect foundation for creating a cross-framework UI library with Mitosis. With Snow Fox, you'll have everything you need to create stunning buttons, inputs, and other base components.


Plus, our system is easy to use and maintain, so you'll be up and running in no time. So why wait? Get started today with Snow Fox!
